embeds.title: Commands
embeds.description: Here are the commands that the bot understands. Make sure to include the prefix ``#`` before the command.‏‏‎ ‎

fields.name: `#rng <number> <number (optional)> `
fields.value:
If only one number is entered after the command, a number from 1 to `that number` is generated. If two numbers are entered, a number from within the range of the two numbers is generated.
Example: ``#rng 5`` (this generates a number from 1 - 5)
Example: `#rng 20 100` (this generates sa number from 20 to 100)
‏‏‎ ‎

fields.name: `#roll <sides> <rolls>`
fields.value:
Roll a dice. The first number after the command is the number of sides the dice has, and the second number is the number of rolls you want to do.
Example: `#roll 6 4` (this rolls a 6-sided dice, 4 times.)
‏‏‎ ‎

fields.name: `#flip`
fields.value:
Flip a coin. The output will be either heads or tails.
‏‏‎ ‎

fields.name: `#list <choice1> <choice2> <etc...>`
fields.value:
Make me choose randomly from a list of your choice. Make sure to separate each item using a space.
Example: `#list apple banana orange` (this chooses a random fruit between the three choices)
